content.description: Sit start with a good right hand and left hand on the arete. From there, work up the arete through edges and precarious feet to reach a double mantel using the good the bumps on top.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is slightly uneven but pads well.
content.location: It climbs the northeast arete of Candy Store.

content.description: Stand start with a left hand sidepull near the arete and a right hand edge about five feet off the ground. From there, ascend the slab using an assortment of holds to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad will work. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Candy Store.

content.description: Sit start with an incut, three finger, left hand sidepull and a good, right hand edge. From there, reach a pair of edges above, follow it to a big, right hand sidepull and a jug, left hand sloper, then the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Candy Store.

content.description: Sit start matched on a large sidepull. From there, climb straight up through edges and teardrops to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing has a rock that makes for uneven business.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Candystore.

content.description: Sit start with a strange, left hand pinch and a right hand sidepull. From there, gain a good, left hand, teardrop pocket, follow to the edges above, achieve a high footing, reach the sloper lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad will work. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Candy Store.
